name: Flying Whales
description:
I was playing around and tuning my CameraManager.cs and wanted something to do whilst my Girlfriend was getting ready to go out, this is pretty much the result of that. 

I hope it's not too hard, I promise it gets easier the further you get :-)

I don't expect nor am I asking for any donations but any and all are much appreciated, thank you! They'll go towards having my own assets built for future games!

Side note - If there was a better way for me to upload this please do share \_o_/
